metadata.description: Pietro Maximoff is Quicksilver; Avenger, son of Magneto and brother of Scarlet Witch, former member of the Brotherhood of Mutants. Not to mention, the fastest living thing on Earth! Check out Quicksilver in his solo series, and discover what adventures await Marvel’s mightiest mutant! In the first issue, Pietro wishes to turn over a new leaf in his hazard-filled life. Quicksilver becomes leader to the Knights of Wundagore!
metadata.name: Quicksilver
